item.title: Oxite: Some Thoughts
item.description: The recently released Oxite code base has taken a bit of a hammering in the blogosphere for a variety of reasons - the general feeling being that it doesnâ€™t really serve as a particularly good example of an ASP.NET MVC application. I was intrigued to read the code though - you can always learn something by doing so and reading code is one of the ares that I want to improve in.
